Node.definition: = state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= pattern of actions by which humans commit specified or implied offenses, ► resulting in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution
literally: dwelling; hence: = state of being entrenched in a particular pattern of behavior
= someone who shows contempt for other people and ideas
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= set of particles marking an object or event as opposed to other objects and events
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= action by which humans speak softly for themselves as if thinking out loud
= during the daytime
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

= causative action by which a tree is planted after having been uprooted from another place, either as a young sapling or as a mature tree, ≈ often used as a metaphor for a nation being made to dwell in a certain place
= a relatively large quantity of liquid flowing with strength
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

= process by which plants and their products become devoid of moisture, and therefore lose color and bend over ► which may ultimately result in death if circumstances do not change; ≈ associated with drought and destruction, often as punishment from God
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= action by which humans complete a task with the expected or desired outcome
= set of particles marking an object or event as opposed to other objects and events
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which the wind causes objects to be moved from one place to the other

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= event where a dispute between two parties is settle by a judge
= pattern of actions by which humans commit specified or implied offenses, ► resulting in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans or deities are actively involved in circumstances relating to the life of humans and animals and care for their well being
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: to perish|to come to an end
Node.definition: = process by which an event comes to an end, usually under unfavorable circumstances
